Title: Imposes a fee on customers who initiate international wire transfers without a valid social security number or taxpayer identification number
Summary: Imposes a fee of not less than twenty per centum of transaction amounts equal to or exceeding one thousand dollars on customers who initiate international wire transfers without a valid social security number or taxpayer identification number.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to imposing a fee on customers who initiate international wire transfers without a valid social security number or taxpayer identification number
